item.description: Free hands-on workshop - How to use LinkedIn for your small business. A 90-minute workshop that outlines how to set up LinkedIn, maximize your profile, build a network, communicate effectively, and track your results. Snacks provided! Starts at 5.45, finishes by 7.30pm.Â  ** Room name / floor will be with security and available when you sign into the building **
item.name: LinkedIn workshop: How to set up and use LinkedIn for your small business
